titleStmt.title: A new song in praise of the Loyal Company of Stationers, who (after the general forfeit,) for their singular loyalty, obtain'd the first Charter of London, Anno 1684. : To the tune of, Winchester wedding.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N.T. at the entrance into the Old-Spring-Garden,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
